channel.title: How can I get more players to my server?
channel.description:
Hello, in the past 2 months I have been developing a server. I have paid for VPS and had many recent updates. We have a moparscape voting page and runelocus page, the players we have (at most 11 players online the webclient at once) are all voting. But no traffic is coming to my server.
I am very new to rsps, but was wandering how any other server owners gained players, please let me know :)
thanks

item.title: How can I get more players to my server?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

No it doesn’t.
LOL @ 3;
LOL @ 4;
LOL @ THIS WHOLE THRED.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I get more players to my server?

item.title: How can I get more players to my server?
item.dc:creator: @flj0yter0p flj0yter0p
item.description:
@flj0yter0p wrote:

  1. May be because of the content and how you’ve made everything. Maybe most people didn’t like it’s style.
  2. Advertise in all communities’ status pages.
  3. Maybe your server isn’t that stable and the most it gets is 11-20 like i used to once.
  4. …Well i think those are it.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I get more players to my server?
